name: Mahjong Solitaire Puzzle Games
description:
The aim is to eliminate all the tiles of the board as fast as you can, removing the pairs with the same picture.

Develop your spacial and logical reasoning, visual memory and thinking agility, turning yourself into a monk... practically! Be as fast as you can and get all the stars from the levels!

Check out Mahjong Solitaire Puzzle Games main features:

▸ More than 1800 puzzles and growing at every new edition;
▸ Three difficulty levels: easy, medium and hard;
▸ Animated stickers to make your conversation more enjoyable and fun (they are really cute! *o*);
▸ Multiplayer games using iMessage: find out who is the fastest player in Timed mode!
▸ Fast levels and relaxing gameplay;
▸ Complete challenges and score up to three stars per solved board;
▸ Beautiful backgrounds and tiles to choose from;
▸ Hints, highlights and undo options.

Ready to be a black belt in Mahjong Solitaire? Download now Mahjong Solitaire Puzzle Games!
